entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
